name: ShatteredSteorra
description:
Hello everyone, glad you opened this page. ShatteredStar is a Hack&Slash anime-style game. It is in early development (3 months so far). The game is inspired by many popular stylized open-world games including Zelda BOW, Genshin Impact, and Fantasy tower. If you are interested in the project and provide feedback. Feel free to join our Discord: https://discord.gg/CsrfUy9dfC

HAVE FUN!
